text: Maneater is a 1973 American TV film directed by Vince Edwards. It was based on an idea of Edwards and shot over 11 days. Jimmy Sangster helped write the script.Will Ben Casey Make Comeback? Smith, Cecil. Los Angeles Times 6 Dec 1973: d37 ==Cast== *Ben Gazzara *Richard Basehart *Sheree North *Laurette Spang. ==Plot== Two couples are chased after by two tigers. ==References== ==External links== *Maneater at BFI *Maneater at IMDb Category:1973 television films Category:1973 films Category:1973 in film
title: Maneater (1973 film)
